attribute.value: select khzbdh as key,khzbmc as value from khfa_khzb_hy

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'年份输入错误，格式应该是:yyyy!' where f_java_rule_date(t.khnf,'yyyy')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'年份输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.khnf)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'机构代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jgdh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.hydh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_hy h where rtrim(t.hydh)=rtrim(h.hydh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error= t.error||'行员代号检查不通过,没有权限!' where not exists(select 1 from table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx where qx.hydh=t.hydh) and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'考核指标名称输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.khzbmc)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz1)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.jhz1,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz1)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'力争值输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.lzz1)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.lzz1,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz2)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.jhz2,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz2)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'力争值输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.lzz2)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.lzz2,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz3)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.jhz3,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz3)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'力争值输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.lzz3)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.lzz3,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz4)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.jhz4,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'计划值输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jhz4)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'力争值输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.lzz4)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.lzz4,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set error=error||cast(t.khnf as varchar(4))||'年份时间维度未初始化，请通知管理员后，再行导入！' where not exists ( select 1 from csb_sjw sjw where cast(t.khnf||'0101' as integer)=sjw.tjrq) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set error=error||'考核指标名称不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from khfa_khzb_hy khzb where khzb.khzbmc=t.khzbmc) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set error = error || '数据已存在!' where exists (select 1 from yjzb_hyjjh jjh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jjh.khdxdh inner join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on jjh.khzbdh=khzb.khzbdh where khzb.khzbmc=t.khzbmc and t.hydh = hy.hydh and jjh.khnf = cast(rtrim(t.khnf) as integer) ) and t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjjhgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select khnf,khzbmc,hydh from hyjjhgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by khnf,khzbmc,hydh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.khnf=dr.khnf and t.khzbmc=dr.khzbmc and t.hydh=dr.hydh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE hyjjhgldr_temp ( khnf varchar(100) , jgdh varchar(100) , jgmc varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , khzbmc varchar(100) , jhz1 varchar(100) , lzz1 varchar(100) , jhz2 varchar(100) , lzz2 varchar(100) , jhz3 varchar(100) , lzz3 varchar(100) , jhz4 varchar(100) , lzz4 varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyjjhgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyjjhgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, khnf,jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,khzbmc,jhz1,lzz1,jhz2,lzz2,jhz3,lzz3,jhz4,lzz4,khdxdh,error from hyjjhgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, khnf,jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,khzbmc,jhz1,lzz1,jhz2,lzz2,jhz3,lzz3,jhz4,lzz4,khdxdh,error from hyjjhgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, khnf,jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,khzbmc,jhz1,lzz1,jhz2,lzz2,jhz3,lzz3,jhz4,lzz4,khdxdh,error from hyjjhgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into YJZB_HYJJH(KHNF,KHZBDH,KHDXDH,JHZ1,LZZ1,JHZ2,LZZ2,JHZ3,LZZ3,JHZ4,LZZ4) select cast (t.khnf as INTEGER),khzb.KHZBDH,hy.KHDXDH, (case when f_java_rule_length(t.jhz1)=0 then null else cast (t.jhz1 as DECIMAL(19,2)) end), (case when f_java_rule_length(t.lzz1)=0 then null else cast (t.lzz1 as DECIMAL(19,2)) end), (case when f_java_rule_length(t.jhz2)=0 then null else cast (t.jhz2 as DECIMAL(19,2)) end), (case when f_java_rule_length(t.lzz2)=0 then null else cast (t.lzz2 as DECIMAL(19,2)) end), (case when f_java_rule_length(t.jhz3)=0 then null else cast (t.jhz3 as DECIMAL(19,2)) end), (case when f_java_rule_length(t.lzz3)=0 then null else cast (t.lzz3 as DECIMAL(19,2)) end), (case when f_java_rule_length(t.jhz4)=0 then null else cast (t.jhz4 as DECIMAL(19,2)) end), (case when f_java_rule_length(t.lzz4)=0 then null else cast (t.lzz4 as DECIMAL(19,2)) end) from hyjjhgldr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=t.hydh inner join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on khzb.khzbmc=t.khzbmc where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (F_JAVA_RULE_LENGTH(t.error)=0 or t.error='数据已存在!')
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from yjzb_hyjjh jjh where exists( select 1 from hyjjhgldr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=rtrim(t.hydh) inner join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on khzb.khzbmc=rtrim(t.khzbmc) where jjh.khnf=cast(rtrim(t.khnf) as integer) and jjh.khzbdh=khzb.khzbdh and jjh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $nf$ khnf,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hyzb.khzbmc,cast(coalesce(jh.jhz1,0) as decimal(21,2)) jhz1,cast(jh.lzz1 as decimal(21,2)) lzz1,cast(coalesce(jh.jhz2,0) as decimal(21,2)) jhz2,cast(jh.lzz2 as decimal(21,2)) lzz2,cast(coalesce(jh.jhz3,0) as decimal(21,2)) jhz3,cast(jh.lzz3 as decimal(21,2)) lzz3,cast(coalesce(jh.jhz4,0) as decimal(21,2)) jhz4,cast(jh.lzz4 as decimal(21,2)) llz4 from khdx_hy hy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and cast('$nf$'||'1231' as integer) between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join khfa_khzb_hy hyzb on 1=1 and hyzb.khzbdh=$khzbmc$ left join yjzb_hyjjh jh on 1=1 and jh.khnf=$nf$ and jh.khzbdh=$khzbmc$ and jh.KHDXDH=hy.khdxdh where hy.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) order by jg.jgdh,hy.hydh
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select khzbdh as key,khzbmc as value from khfa_khzb_hy
